overview: The TeBelgeza is a dance of freedom, the freedom of two interpenetrating elements, the feminine and the masculine, to transform and be born again perpetually. This is a semi-abstract film; it is improvised, stop-motion choreography in ink on tracing paper, a spectacle of transformation where there is no one ‘right’ way but, instead, there is an absolute acceptance of the expression.
title: The TeBelgeza
